scriptLines: SelectRequiredFields2 split(indicator == "Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k" || indicator == "Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k",
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),

message.value: @concat('Expected column count = 13, instead column count = ', string(activity('Get File Metadata').output.columnCount))

properties.description: Data set imported manually after downloading it from course materials.
